definition: to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
Shang Dynasty (c. 1600-1046 BC)/surname Shang

sentences.english: Maybe we can compromise on this.
sentences.chinese: 年夜略我们还可以会商一下。

sentences.english: I think it premature for us to discuss the question of agency.
sentences.chinese: 我以为现在会商代庖代理题目为时过早。

sentences.english: We are going to talk about the problem discussed at the last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 本人们筹办谈一谈前次会上会商的问题。

sentences.english: We are talking about whether we admit students into our club.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在会商是否让学生加入我们的俱乐部。

sentences.english: I guess the only thing to do now is call a halt to this negotiation and part, friend.
sentences.chinese: 我想如今专一能做的便是制止会商，然后分道扬镳吧。

sentences.english: To have a firm self-confidence is a first step toward a succesful negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 有了刚强的自年夜是走向会商告成的第一步。

sentences.english: Business spot for providing Offer programs. The two sides confirmed at the scene.
sentences.chinese: 现场会商，供设计报价方案，双方现场确认。

sentences.english: Figure 5 shows the multi-cavity layouts that have been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 图5显现了多腔会商过的规划。

sentences.english: The discussion helped me orient myself to the new language.
sentences.chinese: 会商帮闲我适应新的发言。

sentences.english: Concentrate on discussing the PVP effect to silver nanometer structure shape appearance.
sentences.chinese: 重点会商PVP对纳米构造银地描摹地影响。

sentences.english: When was the bill called up?
sentences.chinese: 这议案是在甚么时辰被提出会商的？

sentences.english: The central competent authority in consultation with the relevant agencies shall determine the emissions standards in the foregoing paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 前项排放标准，由中央主管机关会商有关机关定之。

definition: to reach an agreement/to agree upon
Huitong county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

joint conference
to discuss together/to try to reach a common judgment/panel discussion
